body_html:
Some of the sampel outputs that I am getting are attached
.

The results are not good.
global step 46300 learning rate 0.2499 step-time 0.89 perplexity 7.50 eval: bucket 0 perplexity 6.22 eval: bucket 1 perplexity 7.30 eval: bucket 2 perplexity 9.18 eval: bucket 3 perplexity 11.42

Should I train till perplexity goes further down? and for the sentences in the development data, I see that for what ever input the translation is _UNK. what could be the reason for this?

body:
Some of the sampel outputs that I am getting are attached 
![sample-translations](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5551707/16106680/15101370-33b4-11e6-8cb0-c206469f4141.png).

The results are not good. 
`global step 46300 learning rate 0.2499 step-time 0.89 perplexity 7.50
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 6.22
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 7.30
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 9.18
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 11.42`

Should I train till perplexity goes further down?  and for the sentences in the development data, I see that for what ever input the translation is _UNK. what could be the reason for this?
